activities: DDMH is a qualitative marketing research company. DDMH gathers in person opinions about issues, products, advertising, and services of many kinds used to guide the development of products and services, and their associated advertising, communication and marketing programs. We collect different kinds of information such as opinions about issues, products and services of interest to us or our clients.  Most this information is collected in person through focus groups or one on one interviews.  Some may be collected by telephone. No individuals are ever identified, rather all information collected is aggregated and reported as such.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Individuals are encouraged to contact DDMH directly via telephone, email or post with any concerns or complaints. DDMH will first work directly with the individual to try to resolve the complaint. DDMH also agrees to fully cooperate with data protection authorities in the European Union and/or their authorized representatives.
